isConfirmed(address,bytes32,uint256,byte.details: Calls the relay contract to check Merkle inclusion proof

params._blockNumber: Height of the block containing the transaction
params._index: Index of transaction in the block
params._intermediateNodes: Merkle inclusion proof for the transaction

returns._0: True if the transaction was included in the block

isConfirmed(address,bytes32,uint256,byte.notice: Checks inclusion of the transaction in the specified block
